title: Black Bean Tortilla Bake
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 onions, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, diced', '1/2 red pepper, diced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '225g tomato salsa', '2 (400g) tins black beans, drained and rinsed', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '2 avocados - peeled, stones removed and mashed', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '12 corn tortillas, quartered', '250g grated Cheddar cheese']
